Volulyte<tm tmtype="reg"/> Infusion Indications and dose

Treatment of hypovolaemia due to acute blood loss when crystalloids alone are not sufficient

By intravenous infusion

  • Adult

    Initially 10–20 mL, then increased to up to 30 mL/kilogram daily for a maximum duration of treatment of 24 hours, the initial dose must be given slowly and with careful monitoring of the patient to allow any anaphylactic reaction to be detected as early as possible.
